contest-event.event-date: Oct. 20, 1962 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright] Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK The Baton of Honour was given to Harry Heyes. The Diploma of Honour was given to Tom Powell.
